item.title: Isekai Saga Awaken Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Isekai Saga Awaken Codes
  • How to Redeem Isekai Saga Awaken Codes
  • How to Get More Codes in Isekai Saga Awaken

In Isekai Saga Awaken , players have to fight the forces of evil using various heroes. Each of them has unique stats and abilities. In addition, depending on the type of unit, they can be effective against some enemies and weaker against others. Therefore, the more different characters you have, the easier it will be for you to win battles. And to start collecting characters from the very beginning, you should use Isekai Saga Awaken codes.

Just a few of these codes will reward you with a large amount of useful resources. This includes Gold, Silver, and Famed Orders. The latter are especially important, as they are needed to summon new units.

Updated January 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Enhance your gameplay by using new codes provided in this guide below. And, of course, feel free to use old codes, as they also offer cool rewards. Be sure to check back regularly for fresh updates.

All Isekai Saga Awaken Codes

Working Isekai Saga Awaken Codes

  • C1D2E3F4G5 - Redeem this code to get Silver, Gold, EXP and other rewards. (NEW)
  • B6C7D8E9F0 - Redeem this code to get Silver, Gold, EXP and other rewards. (NEW)
  • H6I7J8K9L0 - Redeem this code to get Silver, Gold, EXP and other rewards. (NEW)
  • B6C7D8E9F0 - Redeem this code to get a Famed Order, 10K Silver and 100 Gold.
  • C1D2E3F4G5 - Redeem this code to get a 3 Guild Contribution, 10K Silver and 100 Gold.
  • ISEKAIVIP - Redeem this code to get a Famed Order and 2 Challenge Orders
  • N6O7P8Q9R0 - Redeem this code to get 10K Silver, 100 Gold, and a Servant Crystal
  • ISEKAI2024 - Redeem this code to get 20K Silver, a Famed Order, and 2 Adventure Refresh Tickets
  • ISEKAI7777 - Redeem this code to get 100 Friendship, a Famed Order, and 2 Adventure Refresh Tickets
  • ISEKAIOPEN - Redeem this code to get 100 Gold and 10 Famed Orders
  • ISEKAISAGA - Redeem this code to get 5K Hero EXP and a Famed Order
  • T6U7V8W9X0 - Redeem this code to get 10K Silver, 100 Gold, and a Servant Crystal
  • G1H2I3J4K5 - Redeem this code to get 10K Silver, 100 Gold, and a Famed Order

Expired Isekai Saga Awaken Codes

There are no expired codes in Isekai Saga Awaken . We will update this article as soon as more codes become available.

The gameplay of Isekai Saga Awaken is not very different from other representatives of the idle RPGs. You need to fight various enemies by deploying suitable characters. Each of your units has different abilities, strengths and weaknesses. In addition, by combining characters you can get additional bonuses. Therefore, summoning heroes is your main task. And with the help of Isekai Saga Awaken codes you can get many free summons.

The developers add these codes to help players progress. Therefore, each of them contains many useful items and even valuable Famed Orders. However, unfortunately, they are active for a limited time. Therefore, you should not delay in using them if you do not want to miss out on free rewards.

How to Redeem Isekai Saga Awaken Codes

Using Isekai Saga Awaken is quite simple. This feature works as simply as in most other mobile RPGs. So, you just need to follow these steps:

  • Launch Isekai Saga Awaken .
  • Follow the short tutorial until you are given free will.
  • After that, click on your profile photo in the upper left corner of the screen.
  • Then, click on the Redeem Code button and enter the code in the new window.
  • Finally, tap OK to claim your rewards.

How to Get More Codes in Isekai Saga Awaken

To get fresh Isekai Saga Awaken codes, you should bookmark this article. As soon as the developers add new free goodies, we will update this article, as we do with codes for other mobile games. Also, you can visit the official social media pages of the developers:

  • Isekai Saga Awaken Discord server
  • Isekai Saga Awaken Facebook page
  • Isekai Saga Awaken X page

Isekai Saga Awaken is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Top Heroes Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
In Top Heroes , players will have to assemble a team of brave heroes and go fight the forces of evil. However, in addition to exploring new locations, you need to develop your base by building new structures and upgrading them. This requires investing quite a lot of resources. To get them faster, you should use Top Heroes codes.

Each of these codes can reward you with a number of useful items, including Recruit Vouchers and Resource Chests. But as always, their validity is limited. Therefore, if you do not want to miss out on free goodies, you should hurry to use the codes.

Updated January 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: You’ll always be ready for new rewards with this guide. Redeem the new code below to get 2 Stamina Potions, 2 Recruitment Tokens, and 2 Gold Chests. Visit regularly to ensure you’re not missing any exciting codes.

All Top Heroes Codes

Working Top Heroes Codes

  • SerpentTH - Redeem this code to get 2 Stamina Potions, 2 Recruitment Tokens, and 2 Gold Chests. (NEW)
  • 2025TOPHEROES - Redeem this code to get 2 Recruitment Tokens, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Ruby Chests and 5 Level-tied Meat Chests.
  • TopHeroes2025 - Redeem this code to get 2 Recruitment Tokens, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Stone Chests, 5 Level-tied Ruby Chests and 5 Level-tied Meat Chests.
  • Im1of200k - Redeem this code to get 10 Recruitment Tokens, 10 Universal Speed-ups (15m), and 10 Level-tied Meat Chests
  • TH777 - Redeem this code to get 300 Diamonds and 3 Recruit Vouchers
  • Im1of100k - Redeem this code to get 5 Meat Chests, 5 Recruit Vouchers, and 5 Universal Speed-ups for 15 min

Expired Top Heroes Codes

  • MistletoETH
  • THSnowMan
  • JingleBellSTH
  • 2024TOPHEROES
  • TopHeroes2024
  • HarvestSeason
  • SpookyTH
  • TopHeroesLive
  • CakeTime
  • ONEYEARTH
  • WATERFIGHT
  • YUMYUM
  • NANOJOURNEY
  • NewAdventure
  • CherryBlossom
  • MistletoeTH
  • SummerinTH
  • 2024TOPHEROES
  • KZ4QOGCZX5
  • EXPLORER
  • Eggcellent
  • ImYours
  • Abracadabra

As befits the RPG genre, all resources can be found while exploring locations. Some of them drop from defeated enemies, while others are obtained by chopping down trees and mining rocks. However, this process takes quite a long time. Fortunately, there is a way to save time and get many resources and other useful items, namely using Top Heroes codes.

Just a few Top Heroes codes will help you summon new characters, as well as get enough resources to upgrade buildings. However, it is important to note that after the code expires, the rewards are no longer available. Therefore, we recommend that you redeem Top Heroes codes as soon as possible, especially considering that it is quite easy to do.

How to Redeem Top Heroes Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, the rewards for using Top Heroes codes are quite valuable. In addition, the codes feature is available almost from the very beginning of the game. So, you just need to follow these steps to get your goodies:

  • Launch Top Heroes.
  • Follow the short tutorial.
  • Then, click on your profile icon in the upper left corner of the screen and go to settings.
  • After that, click on the Redeem Gift Code option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Confirm button to get the rewards.

How to Get More Top Heroes Codes

As is the case with many other free mobile games, the developers release new codes for Top Heroes quite often. So, you should visit the official social media of the game. There, you will find not only new codes but also news about updates and events:

  • Top Heroes Facebook page
  • Top Heroes Discord server

Top Heroes is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Hunting Sniper Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Hunting Sniper is one of the representatives of hunting simulator games. In it, players will have to compete in hunting various animals. But it is not enough to just hit the target, as you also have to hit vital points to earn more points and win. To do this, you will need to use various weapons, which can be obtained using Hunting Sniper codes.

These codes will reward you with various useful items, such as Gems. Moreover, some of them contain rare Chests from wchhi new rifles drop.

Updated January 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Stay informed about the latest codes by keeping this guide handy. We'll add new freebies as soon as they appear online, but while we're looking for rewards, make sure to redeem the two active codes below. It’s your ultimate resource for fresh rewards.

All Hunting Sniper Codes

Working Hunting Sniper Codes

  • deerhunter - Redeem this code to get a Legendary Chest
  • followcommunity - Redeem this code to get 300 Gems

Expired Hunting Sniper Codes

  • WILDFRIEND
  • DOUBLETWELVE
  • WINTERHUNT
  • HUNTERSGIVING
  • perfectkill
  • Animalfriend
  • Happyanniversary
  • restandplay
  • Purrfectday
  • Funemoji

During the hunt in Hunting Sniper , players manually aim before each shot. But if, in the early stages, it is not difficult to hit the target, then the further you move along the leaderboard, the more difficult the challenges will be. And to win there, you will need to change the weapon to a more powerful one. To do this, players can open Chests or use Hunting Sniper codes.

Each of them will reward you with various free goodies, including the desired Chests of various rarities with new weapons. However, the codes are valid for a limited time, after which they expire and the rewards become unavailable. So, you should redeem them as soon as possible.

How to Redeem Hunting Sniper Codes

Using codes in Hunting Sniper is as easy as in other mobile simulators. Players just need to make a few taps:

  • First, launch Hunting Sniper .
  • After that, click on the button with three stripes in the upper right corner of the screen and go to Settings.
  • Then select the Game tab and tap on the Redemption Code button.
  • Next, enter the code and click Redeem to get your well-deserved goodies.

It is important to note that Hunting Sniper is case-sensitive, so you should be more careful when entering each code. For convenience, we recommend that you copy and paste them from our list.

How to Get More Hunting Sniper Codes

If you do not want to miss more Hunting Sniper codes, we recommend that you visit the developer's pages. Just like with most other free mobile games, there they post all the latest news about the game, including codes.

  • Hunting Sniper Facebook page
  • HuntingSniperGame X page
  • Official Hunting Sniper page

Hunting Sniper is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Mech Arena Promo Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Mech Arena is a dynamic multiplayer shooter for mobile devices in which you can experience an unforgettable experience of controlling a mech. Having chosen a large robot and equipped it with parts and weapons, you can go to one of the game modes to test your skills and earn currency to buy something more powerful. Victories bring tons of valuable currency rewards and even cases, but if you want to get something for free, use Mech Arena promo codes.

Using codes, you can get in-game currency, components for your mechs, or other stuff. However, codes have a limited expiration date, so you should use them as soon as possible.

Updated January 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Our team works hard to ensure this guide is always up-to-date. Below you will find three active codes, redeeming which you can get game currency, crates and other cool freebies. Bookmark it and check back for exciting new codes.

All Mech Arena Codes

Working Mech Arena Codes

  • HOLIDAYMECH - Enter this code to get the 300 A-coins, 100k Credits, an Amateur Crate, and the Legendary skin Slay Ride for Killshot.
  • MIDGAMEGIFT - Enter this code to get the 200 A-coins and Credits.
  • MIDGAMER - Enter this code to get the Prodigy Crate.

Expired Mech Arena Codes

  • SPOOKYSHOT - Enter this code to get the Epic Skins.
  • mech3years - Enter this code to get the Golden Age Epic Skin.
  • FIREPOWER - Enter this code to get the rare weapon Rocket Mortar 10.
  • CHAMPION - Enter this code to get the Skin.

While you can get all the best parts and weapons for your mechs by just playing the game, sometimes there's nothing better than a little freebie. Of course, you will not get super powerful items using the codes, but you can get a decent weapon or some money to buy new items quite early on. After all, replenishing your hangar with new components is one of every player's main goals, allowing you to diversify the gameplay significantly. However, reward codes have a limited expiration date, so hurry up and get all of them.

How to Redeem Mech Arena Codes

Unlike in many mobile games, the ability to redeem codes in Mech Arena is available from the first seconds of the gameplay. To do this, you need to copy the active code and follow these steps:

  • Launch Mech Arena .
  • Once in the main menu, click on the envelope icon at the top of the screen to go to the Mail tab.
  • Go to the Promo Code tab.
  • Enter the code in the Enter Promo Code text box.
  • Click Confirm, and you will receive your rewards.

How to Get More Mech Arena Codes

As with most other free mobile games, you can find more Mech Arena promo codes during events and holidays or as a regular promotional reward created to increase popularity. You can find a list of all new codes by checking our guide periodically. However, if you want to keep abreast of all the in-game news, you can follow the official developer pages:

  • Discord
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • YouTube

Mech Arena is available on mobile devices.

item.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross
  • The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Tips and Tricks
  • How to Get More The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes
  • The Best Anime Games Like The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes
  • About the The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Developers

In this article, players looking for freebies in The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross will find various codes. By redeeming them, they'll be able to receive many valuable in-game rewards. However, users must remember that these codes can expire at anytime, so they must act quickly.

Updated January 27, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: New codes are released frequently, and we’re always on top of it. Also, in this guide you will find detailed instructions on how to redeem them, The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross tips and tricks, how to get more codes, and a list of the best similar games in case you're looking for a new gaming experience. Keep this guide saved for easy access to updates.

All The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes

Codes Checked on January 27, 2025.

How to Redeem Codes in The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross

Redeeming codes in this game is slightly different from other similar games and varies from platform to platform, so players can find step-by-step instructions below.

For PC and iOS Users

  • Visit The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross code redemption website.
  • Find a Netmarble ID, which can be found under the player info section within the game.
  • Choose the server.
  • Enter the desired code into the designated "Enter coupon code" field.
  • Check the in-game mailbox for rewards.

For Android Users

  • Launch The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross.
  • Tap the Menu button located in the bottom-right corner.
  • Select the "Misc" option.
  • Select the "Coupons" in the bottom left corner.
  • Enter the code and tap on the "Redeem" button.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Tips and Tricks

  • Daily Tasks: Begin each day by completing the tasks in the quest log, which depend on the story's progress.
  • Fort Solgres: In this dungeon, gather bugs, enhanced potions, and gold, while also earning SSR pendants.
  • PvP: Engage in ungeared PvP battles to improve rank and receive valuable rewards. Stay updated on evolving strategies.
  • Knighthood Boss: Collaborate with Knighthood for boss encounters, collecting Knighthood coins, and increasing rank for shop privileges.
  • Demonic Beast Battle: This mode becomes significant in the late game, providing holy relics for character improvements.
  • Prioritize the Storyline: It yields precious gems and unlocks crucial game elements.

How to Get More The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes

Players can find new codes on the developer's Twitter account, where they can also find news about updates and other interesting things. In addition, fans can bookmark this article to make sure they don't miss any new codes because this article is updated every month.

The Best Anime Games Like The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Codes

These days, players are spoiled for choice when it comes to anime-inspired video games, with hundreds of solid options all just a few clicks away. Below, players can find five of the best games like The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross , all of which are well worth checking out.

  • One Punch Man: The Strongest
  • Bleach Blood War
  • DS - Blade of Hashira
  • ONE PIECE Bounty Rush
  • ONE PIECE TREASURE CRUISE

About the The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross Developers

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross is developed by a fairly large and popular company - Netmarble. The company is located in South Korea and has already released numerous games for different tastes. Here are some of them:

  • Lineage 2: Revolution
  • Marvel Future Fight
  • BTS World
  • Blade & Soul Revolution

In March 2020, Netmarble earned on The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross over 200 million dollars in revenue, and this was only at the start of the game. Now, the company continues to work on other games actively.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Grand Cross is available on PC, iOS, and Android.
